definitions.definition: a person or thing that carries, holds, or conveys something.
synonyms: porter "our private carrier delivers more than ten thousand packages a month"

definitions.definition: a person or company that undertakes the professional conveyance of goods or people.
examples: Pan Am was the third US carrier to cease operations in 1991

definitions.definition: a vessel or vehicle for transporting people or things, especially goods in bulk.
examples: the largest timber carrier ever to dock at a Malaysian port

definitions.definition: a company that provides facilities for conveying telecommunications messages.
a person or animal that transmits a disease-causing organism to others. Typically, the carrier suffers no symptoms of the disease.
examples: the black rat, best known as carrier of bubonic plague

definitions.definition: a person or other organism that possesses a particular gene, especially as a single copy whose effect is masked by a dominant allele, so that the associated characteristic (such as a hereditary disease) is not displayed but may be passed to offspring.
a substance used to support or convey another substance such as a pigment, catalyst, or radioactive material.
a molecule that transfers a specified molecule or ion within the body, especially across a cell membrane.
